com.google.devtools.common.options

Interface OptionsClassProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OptionsProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptionsParser

    public interface OptionsClassProvider
    A read-only interface for options parser results, which only allows to query the options of a specific class, but not e.g. the residue any other information pertaining to the command line.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static OptionsClassProvider EMPTY 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <O extends OptionsBase>
      O      		 getOptions(java.lang.Class<O> optionsClass)
      Returns the options instance for the given optionsClass, that is, the parsed options, or null if it is not among those available.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final OptionsClassProvider EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        @Nullable
<O extends OptionsBase> O getOptions(java.lang.Class<O> optionsClass)
        Returns the options instance for the given optionsClass, that is, the parsed options, or null if it is not among those available.

        The returned options should be treated by library code as immutable and a provider is permitted to return the same options instance multiple times.
